title: New: Groves – Paperback (Demo)
content: London quintet Groves first impressed with a trio of tracks back in July of this year, and have now transferred one of the demos over to their Soundcloud page, where it’s sure to reach a wider audience. Paperback, is somewhere between the accessible, yet slightly off-kilter indie pop of Alt-J, and more languid, harmony led artists, such as Washed Out or even Youth Lagoon.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
